column4: hey, could any of you fine folks tell me why my modem speed might be so slow, and how i can speed it up? i am running an external 56k US robotics on ubuntu
No, i know that my modem is much faster on windows... there must be somting wrong with the config, or somthing that would make it so slow...
you know, i tried does anyone know how to make your letters red, or to speak privatly to someone?
it shows red when I type your name in xchat, and /msg <person> <stuff> is the other part
